Function# AudioConvertNanosToHostTime(_:)

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.0+

```
func AudioConvertNanosToHostTime(_ inNanos: UInt64) -> UInt64
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/coreaudio/audioconvertnanostohosttime(_:)#parameters)

`inNanos`A UInt64 containing the nanosecond time to convert.

## [Return Value](/documentation/coreaudio/audioconvertnanostohosttime(_:)#return-value)

A UInt64 containining the converted nanosecond time.

## [Discussion](/documentation/coreaudio/audioconvertnanostohosttime(_:)#discussion)

Convert the given nanosecond time into a host time.
